body.bibl: Sauget, Joseph-Marie. “Une Découverte Inespérée: L’Homélie 2 de Sévère d’Antioche, Sur l’Annonciation de La Théotokos.” In A Tribute to Arthur Vööbus: Studies in Early Christian Literature and Its Environment, Primarily in the Syrian East, edited by Robert H.
